vclaim: Actor Billy Dee Williams pranked Mark Hamill by telling him before a meeting with Princess Margaret that making direct eye contact with a royal was punishable by imprisonment in the Tower of London. This resulted in a photograph in which Hamill can be seen looking down as he meets the princess.
title: Did Billy Dee Williams Prank Mark Hamill Before They Met British Royalty?
subtitle: A photograph shows Hamill, who played Luke Skywalker, looking away as he shook hands with Princess Margaret.
author: Nur Ibrahim
